A River Runs Through It is based on the true story of two fly fishing brothers, Norman and Paul, (Brad Pitt and Craig Sheffer) whose Reverend father (Tom Skerritt) tries to teach them life’s lessons by way of Fly Fishing. This movie is a piece of the time in which it was made..... Realistic. Movies were not candy coated during the late 60s and early 70s. They reflected life in all its grime and misdemeanour.
